fields.name: t
fields.description: relative time

fields.name: ion_current_M2
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram.

fields.name: ion_current_M32
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram.

fields.name: E
fields.description: WE potential

fields.name: current1_mA
fields.description: WE current

fields.name: coll_current
fields.description: collector electrode current

fields.name: current1
fields.description: WE current

fields.name: current1_muA
fields.description: WE current

fields.name: ion_current_M2_sBG_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where a background was adjusted by simply removing the last datapoint from the original curve (sB - simple background).

fields.name: ion_current_M2_sBG_ALS
fields.description: Background for the ion_current_M2_sBG_sub curve, determined with an asymmetric least square approach.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_sBG_ALS_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where a background was adjusted by removing the last datapoint from the original curve and removing the ion_current_M2_sBG_ALS curve.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_ALS
fields.description: Background for the ion_current_M2 curve, determined with an asymmetric least square approach.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_UVS
fields.description: Background for the ion_current_M2 curve, determined with a univariate spline.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_UVS_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where the ion_current_M2_UVS curve was removed.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_UVS_ALS
fields.description: Background for ion_current_M2 curve, determined from a univariate spline and an asymmetric least square approach.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_UVS_ALS_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where the ion_current_M2_UVS_ALS curve was removed.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_MF
fields.description: Background for ion_current_M2 curve, determined from applying a median filter, averaging over significant portion of the datapoints, which flattens any kind of signals.

fields.name: ion_current_M2_MF_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where the ion_current_M2_MF curve was removed.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_sBG_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where a background was adjusted by simply removing the last datapoint from the original curve (sB - simple background).

fields.name: ion_current_M32_sBG_ALS
fields.description: Background for the ion_current_M32_sBG_sub curve, determined with an asymmetric least square approach.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_sBG_ALS_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where a background was adjusted by removing the last datapoint from the original curve and removing the ion_current_M32_sBG_ALS curve.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_ALS
fields.description: Background for the ion_current_M32 curve, determined with an asymmetric least square approach.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_UVS
fields.description: Background for the ion_current_M32 curve, determined with a univariate spline.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_UVS_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where the ion_current_M32_UVS curve was removed.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_UVS_ALS
fields.description: Background for ion_current_M32 curve, determined from a univariate spline and an asymmetric least square approach.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_UVS_ALS_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where the ion_current_M32_UVS_ALS curve was removed.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_MF
fields.description: Background for ion_current_M32 curve, determined from applying a median filter, averaging over significant portion of the datapoints, which flattens any kind of signals.

fields.name: ion_current_M32_MF_sub
fields.description: Ion current for the mass cyclic voltammogram, where the ion_current_M32_MF curve was removed.

fields.name: j
fields.description: WE current density

fields.name: current1_mA_geo
fields.description: WE current density

electrodes.name: WE

description: Sputtering and flash annealing to 1600 K with repeated cycles of oxygen adsorption and desorption.

electrodes.comment: The electrode contact area is determined by the inner diameter of the O-ring of the electrochemical cell.

electrochemical cell.cell description: A dual layer flow cell for DEMS or Collector electrode measurements.
electrochemical cell.cleaning procedure: Storing in highly concentrated KOH and boiling in Milli-Q water.

electrolyte.comment: The given temperature refers to room temperature.
